    Welcome

    Welcome to the homepage of the Rasmussen Lab @ UW Biology

    We are a team of dedicated scientists studying the development and repair of sensory structures in the skin.

    The lab is looking for enthusiastic and hard-working researchers at all levels! Learn how to join the lab.
